name: Game A Month #1
description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to my Game A Month #1. You'll be able to download a prototype of the game while it's in development then when the games completed I'll upload a final build. 

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Side Dash - Q and E

Attack - Left Click

I hope you enjoy the prototype! Let me know what you think in the comments of my YouTube video or in the comments below. 

Channel Link
